akn:section.akn:heading: Uniform rules of evidence of racial discrimination

akn:content.akn:p: § 1655. Uniform rules of evidence of racial discrimination The rules of evidence required to prove that State or local authorities are practicing racial discrimination in assigning students to public schools shall be uniform throughout the United States. (Pub. L. 92–318, title VIII, § 805, June 23, 1972, 86 Stat. 372.)
